channel.title: [TuT] How to Multi Log In On Runescape![EASY!]
channel.description:
Original Post:CodersRus.org Ok, in this tut I will teach you how to do a multi log cheat for runescape.
Ok firstly Open up 2! windows. Go to Runescape.com on both Than click Play Runescape on both Than on ONLY 1! scroll down and click: [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/21mfed0.jpg[/img] Than on that click the work you want to go to.
Than on the other one do what you regularly do.(make sure you pick the same world as the other window) NOTE:I HAVEN'T DONE THIS GLITCH IN A LONG TIME SO IT MIGHT NOT WORK SO IDK IF MY COMP WILL WORK(COMP IS TO SLOW)

item.title: [TuT] How to Multi Log In On Runescape![EASY!]
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Gah, runescapers say the most randomish things. We went from not being offended by someone to discussing the possible leeching of this tutorial to not knowing moparisthebest to using a proxy to log into the same server and finally to not being able to trade from one account to another when they are both being used by the same person. Wow, several subjects in a few posts; all of which are irrelevant to the tutorial at hand.

Read full topic
